editorialSummary.text: High-end designer line with Paris origins, offering men's & women's clothing, accessories & more.

originalText.text: When I walked through the door, I was immediately greeted by the entire team. Cooper introduced himself to me and offered me something to drink. Cooper helped me make my decision on my beautiful bag and matching wallet. I felt very welcome and comfortable while shopping in the store and was able to make my purchase. I will definitely be shopping with them in the future. Thank you, Cooper, for helping me make my big girl purchase!

text.text: When I walked through the door, I was immediately greeted by the entire team. Cooper introduced himself to me and offered me something to drink. originalText.text:
Took wife and daughter shopping here last weekend.  Ran into one of the best, nicest and most personable salespeople I have ever met!  Cooper exemplifies what it means to bring personable service to  a retail business.  We had the most fun learning what products would work best for my daughter.  Will most definitely be back for more!
Gordon

originalText.text: I had a very good experience with the YSL Boutique. During my vacation in Naples my purse was damaged and the tassel was missing after a man on Vesp tried to steal my purse. YSL took a great care of my beloved purse. The chain was fixed and tassel replaced at no cost! Employees are very helpful and professional!

text.text: I had a very good experience with the YSL Boutique. During my vacation in Naples my purse was damaged and the tassel was missing after a man on Vesp tried to steal my purse. YSL took a great care of my beloved purse. The chain was fixed and tassel replaced at no cost! Employees are very helpful and professional!

originalText.text: Do yourself a favor… book your shopping appointment with Cooper. This was by far the best experience I’ve ever had at any boutique I’ve been to. Cooper was friendly and professional. He was incredibly honest and informative. I can’t wait for my next trip to NYC to visit Cooper at YSL, I’m so in love with my purchase and the selection offered to me!

He was incredibly honest and informative. I can’t wait for my next trip to NYC to visit Cooper at YSL, I’m so in love with my purchase and the selection offered to me!

originalText.text:
I popped into the Saint Laurent store just intending to buy a money clip, but what I experienced was truly unforgettable. Even in the rush of the busy third floor, Kevin, the standout associate, came over to assist.

Kevin's charisma and product knowledge were simply stellar. He introduced me to a range of items that perfectly fit my style, even suggesting a magnificent big bag and chic Saint Laurent tags - purchases I hadn't planned but absolutely adored.

I walked out with more than I bargained for, and each item brought me immense joy. The whole shopping trip was smooth and delightful, thanks to Kevin's dedicated assistance.

Moving forward, there's no doubt in my mind - Kevin will be my go-to person for all my Saint Laurent needs. His top-notch service transformed my shopping trip into an extraordinary experience. If you happen to visit the Saint Laurent store, don't forget to ask for Kevin; you'll thank me later!
